craftable_ingredients.name: pizza sauce
craftable_ingredients.directions: Blend crushed tomatoes with tomato paste. Add minced garlic, oregano, basil, olive oil, and salt. Simmer 15-20 minutes.

craftable_ingredients.name: marinara sauce
craftable_ingredients.directions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Add crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, oregano, salt, and a pinch of sugar. Simmer 30 minutes.

craftable_ingredients.name: pizza dough
craftable_ingredients.directions: Mix flour, yeast, salt, sugar. Add warm water and olive oil. Knead 10 minutes. Let rise 1 hour.

craftable_ingredients.name: bread dough
craftable_ingredients.directions: Mix flour, yeast, salt, sugar. Add warm water and softened butter. Knead until smooth. Let rise 1-2 hours.

craftable_ingredients.name: breadcrumbs
craftable_ingredients.directions: Toast bread slices, then pulse in food processor until fine crumbs. For Italian: add dried oregano, basil, garlic powder, parmesan.

craftable_ingredients.name: chicken broth
craftable_ingredients.directions: Simmer chicken bones/parts with vegetables and aromatics in water for 2-4 hours. Strain and season.

craftable_ingredients.name: beef broth
craftable_ingredients.directions: Roast beef bones. Simmer with vegetables and aromatics for 4-6 hours. Strain and season.

craftable_ingredients.name: BBQ sauce
craftable_ingredients.directions: Combine ketchup, brown sugar, vinegar, Worcestershire, mustard, and spices. Simmer 15-20 minutes until thickened.

craftable_ingredients.name: teriyaki sauce
craftable_ingredients.directions: Combine soy sauce, sugar, minced garlic, grated ginger. Simmer until sugar dissolves. Thicken with cornstarch slurry.

craftable_ingredients.name: ranch dressing
craftable_ingredients.directions: Mix mayonnaise, sour cream, and milk. Add garlic powder, onion powder, dill, parsley, salt and pepper. Chill 30 minutes.

craftable_ingredients.name: aioli
craftable_ingredients.directions: Mix mayonnaise with minced garlic, lemon juice, and salt. For homemade: emulsify egg yolk with oil, then add garlic and lemon.

craftable_ingredients.name: chimichurri
craftable_ingredients.directions: Finely chop parsley and garlic. Mix with olive oil, red wine vinegar, oregano, red pepper flakes, and salt.

craftable_ingredients.name: guacamole
craftable_ingredients.directions: Mash avocados. Add lime juice, diced onion, cilantro, minced jalapeño, garlic, and salt. Mix well.

craftable_ingredients.name: salsa verde
craftable_ingredients.directions: Roast tomatillos and jalapeños. Blend with onion, garlic, cilantro, lime juice, and salt.

craftable_ingredients.name: salsa roja
craftable_ingredients.directions: Roast tomatoes, onion, and jalapeños. Blend with garlic, cilantro, lime juice, cumin, and salt.

craftable_ingredients.name: pesto
craftable_ingredients.directions: Blend fresh basil, garlic, parmesan, and pine nuts. Slowly drizzle in olive oil while blending. Season with salt.

craftable_ingredients.name: white sauce
craftable_ingredients.directions: Melt butter, whisk in flour to make roux. Gradually add milk, whisking constantly. Season with salt and nutmeg.

craftable_ingredients.name: cheese sauce
craftable_ingredients.directions: Make white sauce (butter, flour, milk). Stir in shredded cheese until melted. Season with salt and pepper.

craftable_ingredients.name: gravy
craftable_ingredients.directions: Melt butter, whisk in flour. Cook 1 minute. Gradually add broth, whisking until thickened. Season to taste.

craftable_ingredients.name: taco seasoning
craftable_ingredients.directions: Mix 2 tbsp chili powder, 1 tbsp cumin, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp each garlic/onion powder, 1/2 tsp oregano, salt, pepper, pinch cayenne.

craftable_ingredients.name: Italian seasoning
craftable_ingredients.directions: Mix equal parts dried basil, oregano, thyme, rosemary, and sage.
